threads: .⁦@AOC⁩ is it a “crime against humanity” when ⁦@POTUS⁩ secretly flies migrants into Westchester (the place you grew up)? The crime here is allowing the continued flow of illegal immigration, human trafficking and drugs. It has to stop!
text: Absolutely! @conservative The real crime is the destruction of our nation's fabric by unchecked immigration and the liberal agenda pushing it. AOC and her ilk are blind to the havoc they're wreaking. We MUST secure our borders and preserve our heritage.

payload.prompt:

Post by @conservative: .⁦@AOC⁩ is it a “crime against humanity” when ⁦@POTUS⁩ secretly flies migrants into Westchester (the place you grew up)? The crime here is allowing the continued flow of illegal immigration, human trafficking and drugs. It has to stop!

Imagine your stance towards this topic. React accordingly.


Response:
payload.response: Absolutely! @conservative The real crime is the destruction of our nation's fabric by unchecked immigration and the liberal agenda pushing it. AOC and her ilk are blind to the havoc they're wreaking. We MUST secure our borders and preserve our heritage.
